metadata.description: Professional SMM: from strategy to first sales. We will select a plan that fits your budget.
metadata.title: Social Media Promotion (SMM) | WebLeadCraft

intro.title: SMM. Brand Promotion in Social Media
intro.description: SMM (Social Media Marketing) is the promotion of your brand across social networks. It involves attracting new followers to your accounts and communities and 'converting' them into actual customers.

0.title: Defining Baseline Data
text: Getting to know your brand and/or product
Analyzing your website, groups, and corporate social media accounts
Studying target audience characteristics and competitors

1.title: Creating Preconditions for Success
text: Selecting the 'packaging': promo posts, ads, presentations

2.title: Choosing a Strategy
text: ...and strengthening the ones already in use

3.title: Setting Up Analytics
text: Setting up call tracking to monitor phone leads
Studying target audience behavior and competition

tariffs.title: Choose Your Plan
tariffs.description: SMM is always a comprehensive set of services. The cost of SMM promotion depends on the specific activities included. Depending on your goals, you can choose one of three plans:

base.name: Base
base.previewText:
Maintaining current results, supporting engagement, and activity of the existing audience. 
Ad campaigns are focused on boosting posts published in the account.
base.forWhomText: This package is suitable for maintaining the engagement of an already established social media audience. It aims to attract new followers and increase reach through engaging content. Our main task is to create unique, attractive content for your followers and use ads to boost visibility.
includedList: Competitor and brand analysis in social media
Account visual design: Avatar and Cover
Listing products, services, and photos (up to 5 items)

standard.name: Standard
standard.previewText: Comprehensive promotion with a focus on audience growth and active sales through content.
standard.forWhomText: Suitable for small and medium-sized businesses needing regular leads and active community growth.

premium.name: Premium
premium.previewText: Maximum reach and brand image development. Full reputation and traffic management.
premium.forWhomText: For large companies and brands aiming for niche dominance and large-scale advertising campaigns.

introduction.title: Website development and promotion with guaranteed results

previewCards.title: Development

previewCards.title: Development

previewCards.title: Development

aboutCompanyBlock.title: WebCanape — a digital agency with clear guarantees
aboutCompanyBlock.text: We provide transparent guarantees and focus on results and customer service.

items.title: Increase brand awareness
items.text: We help your brand become more recognized and trusted.

items.title: Boost inbound customer flow
items.text: We guide your potential clients to take action using marketing tools.

title.text: Driving leads in a performance format

stepsOfWork.title: Stages of work
steps: Complete a brief to define goals and responsibilities
Audit and create a promotion strategy with a timeline
Set up platforms and communication channels, manage content

consultationBlock.title: Leave a request for a business consultation
keyPoints: We show examples of client results and ads
You get a recording of the consultation
